welcome: We’re a web design & development agency based in Canada, creating beautiful, high-performing websites for brands around the world.
thankYouDescription: We have received your message and will get back to you shortly.
aboutUsText1: At MadeWithLux, we believe that design is more than just making things look pretty. It's about creating websites that not only look amazing but also work effectively to help your business stand out, connect with your customers, and grow over time. We focus on crafting digital experiences that drive results and make a real difference for your brand.
aboutUsText2: We aim to create websites that truly represent your brand's unique identity. We design digital experiences that connect with your audience on a personal level, engage them effectively, and ultimately support your business goals. Whether it's boosting sales, increasing brand awareness, or fostering deeper relationships with your customers, our websites are built to help you bring your business vision to life.
aboutUsText3: When you work with us, you’re getting more than just a website. You’re getting a team committed to making your brand stand out and thrive online.
A stunning project that showcases creati: A stunning project that showcases creativity.
A sleek and modern web design project.
A project that blends aesthetics and fun: A project that blends aesthetics and functionality.
Project One Case Study: Project One was designed to enhance user experience by simplifying navigation and improving visual appeal. It resulted in a 30% increase in engagement.
Project Two Case Study: Project Two aimed at creating a dynamic e-commerce platform. With a focus on seamless transactions, the project increased sales by 20%.
Project Three Case Study: Project Three combined branding and UI/UX to create a memorable digital experience. It improved customer satisfaction by 25%.
testimonial1: Our website looks beautiful and makes ordering easier for our customers.
testimonial2: Great experience working with the team. They were professional and nailed the vision for my portfolio.
testimonial3: The strategy session was outstanding. Highly recommend their service.
yourMessagePlaceholder: What would you like to say?
letUsDiscuss: Let's Discuss How We Can Grow Your Business
happyToTalk: I'm always happy to talk to business owners, even if it's not about websites.
aboutDescription: We’re passionate about helping your business grow and scale online. Here are some of the reasons you should choose us:

howItWorksDesc: From consultation to launch, here's how we bring your website to life.
step1Desc: We start with a discovery call to understand your goals and challenges.
step2Desc: We prepare a custom strategy aligned with your business objectives.
step3Desc: We create a modern prototype tailored to your vision.
step4Desc: You review the design and provide feedback.
step5Desc: We develop and test your website thoroughly.
step6Desc: Once approved, we launch your site to the world.

servicesSection.ctaSubtitle: Let’s bring your vision to life with strategic design and seamless execution.

list.description: Full project guidance from planning to a seamless site launch.

portfolio.title: Website Redesign for an Event Planning & Rental Company
portfolio.description: Made it easy for customers to explore services and book rentals online.
portfolio.caseStudyDesc: Through strategic design and thoughtful development, we were able to address key challenges Events by Lorlar faced in customer engagement and service presentation. By implementing intuitive user experiences, clear service showcases, and valuable content, we helped drive stronger client interactions.

gallery.challenges: Customers lacked an easy, intuitive way to browse and rent items online, resulting in a cumbersome booking process.
gallery.solutions: We developed a streamlined, user-friendly rental store allowing customers to effortlessly browse and book items with just a few clicks.
gallery.results: The new system has made it easier for customers to easily rent items online, reducing back-and-forth.

gallery.challenges: The website did not effectively communicate the full range of event planning services, leaving potential clients uncertain about the value offered.
gallery.solutions: We created a dedicated, visually engaging section to highlight event planning services and showcase past work in a professional manner.
gallery.results: The new service presentation has improved client understanding of the business's offerings, helping attract and engage more prospective clients.

gallery.challenges: The site lacked a central platform for sharing valuable content like event planning tips, trends, and inspiration, limiting opportunities to engage with potential clients.
gallery.solutions: We added a dynamic blog section where the team can regularly share insights, trends, and event ideas, positioning the brand as an authority in the industry.
gallery.results: The blog will foster increased trust with visitors, showcasing expertise and making it easier for potential clients to connect with and choose the services.

portfolio.title: AI Prompt Application
portfolio.description: An open-source AI prompting tool for the modern world to discover, create, and share creative prompts.
portfolio.caseStudyDesc: This project is all about empowering creators in the AI space. By building a modern, open-source tool focused on accessibility and design, we helped turn an idea into a collaborative, community-driven platform for the future of AI creativity.

gallery.challenges: There was no visually engaging, user-friendly platform for discovering and sharing AI prompts — especially one that caters to a modern, creative audience.
gallery.solutions: We designed and developed an open-source web app where users can explore, create, and share AI prompts effortlessly. The interface emphasizes simplicity, community, and creativity, with built-in tools for managing and showcasing prompts.
gallery.results: Users now have a centralized, intuitive space to organize, reuse, and discover AI prompts — saving time and sparking more consistent creativity.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website for a Software Developer
portfolio.description: A professional, easy-to-navigate website that highlights their work, experience, and writing.
portfolio.caseStudyDesc: This project focused on bridging the gap between technical depth and visual storytelling. By reimagining how portfolio projects are presented, we created a more inclusive, professional, and impactful experience that better communicates the developer's skills and value.

gallery.challenges: While each project had a detailed README on GitHub, the portfolio lacked a visual presentation, making it less accessible to non-technical visitors and potential collaborators.
gallery.solutions: We designed and developed a dedicated portfolio section that transforms GitHub projects into engaging showcases — complete with visuals, concise summaries, and key tech stacks — tailored for both technical and non-technical audiences.
gallery.results: The portfolio now provides a clear, visually rich overview of the developer’s work, allowing visitors to quickly grasp project scope, impact, and relevance at a glance.
